Allergologic panel with a minimum of 15 respiratory and nutritive allergens (dermatiphagoides pteronissinus, dermatophagoides Farina, alder, birch, hazel, mixed grasses, rye, wormwood, cat, dog, alternaria alternata, egg white, milk, peanuts, wheat flour). Immuno-blot method. Each panel contains 5 standards calibrated by WHO IRP 75/502 for IgE or equivalent, which allows obtaining a true quantitative result, for RIDA qLine or equivalent

Allergologic panel 15 with a minimum respiratory allergens dermatiphagoides pteronissinus, dermatophagoides Farina, alder, oak, mixed grasses, rye, plantago, cat, dog, guinea pig, rabbit, penicilium notatum, cladosporum herbarum, aspergillus fumugatus, alternaria alternata). Immuno-blot method. Each panel contains 5 standards calibrated by WHO IRP 75/502 for IgE or equivalent, which allows obtaining a true quantitative result RIDA qLine Allergy System or equivalent

Allergologic panel with a minimum of 15 nutrition allergens (hazelnuts, peanuts, walnuts, almonds, milk, egg white, egg yolk, casein, oranges, apples, bananas, wheat flour, rye flour, sesame seeds, soy beans). Immuno-blot method. Each panel contains 5 standards calibrated by WHO IRP 75/502 for IgE or equivalent, which allows obtaining a true quantitative result RIDA qLine Allergy System or equivalent

Allergologic panel with minimum 15 respiratory and nutritional pediatric allergens (dermatiphagoides pteronissinus, dermatophagoides Farina, birch, mixed grasses, cat, dog, Alternaria alternata, milk, a-lactoalbumin, b-lactoglobulin, casein, egg white, egg yolk, bovine serum albumin, soy). Immuno-blot method. Each panel contains 5 standards calibrated by WHO IRP 75/502 for IgE or equivalent, which allows obtaining a true quantitative result allergen analytics RIDA qLine Allergy System or equivalent

Allergologic panel with a minimum of 15 nutrition allergens specific to our region (milk, egg white, tomatoes, hazelnuts, peanuts, meat, sesame, cocoa, casein, gluten, egg yolk, peach, banana, strawberries, oranges). Immuno-blot method. Each panel contains 5 standards calibrated by WHO IRP 75/502 for IgE or equivalent, which allows obtaining a true quantitative result RIDA qLine Allergy System or equivalent

Allergologic panel with a minimum 15 respiratory allergens and venoms, characteristic of our region (duck, domestic dust, beetle, ivy, early pollen wood, late pollen wood, acacia, oats, wheat, latex, sunflower, sting of a bee sting wasp, cockroach, formic acid). Immuno-blot method. Each panel contains 5 standards calibrated by WHO IRP 75/502 for IgE or equivalent, which allows obtaining a true quantitative result RIDA qLine Allergy System or equivalent

CCD-inhibitor reagent for allergologic panels with a maximum of 20 and minimum of 5 allergen calibration standard according to WHO IRP 75/502 for IgE or equivalent, application analyzer allergen Rida qLine Allergy System or equivalent
Kit fro quality control of the analyzer with membranes with applied bands, with different intensity of coloration, compatible with the RIDA qLine Allergy System or equivalent

Cartridge for eashing and waste for machine RAPID POINT405, or equivalent
Cartridge for automatic control of the quality for machine RAPID POINT405, or equivalent

Detector clot for machine RAPID POINT405, or equivalent
